biography.summary: Alex Padilla is an American politician serving as the United States Senator from California since January 3, 2023. A Democrat, he was appointed in January 2021 to fill the seat and subsequently won election to continue serving in the Senate.

contact.office_address: 331 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Appointed to the U.S. Senate to fill the California seat.
Won a special election to continue serving in the U.S. Senate.
Began current term as Senator from California.
